first_story_block: You the hatch door wide open and look down into it. You see a few more shelves and notice that room leads further back. You feel a draft coming from that direction.

action_results.result: You jump down into the underground room and a little bit of dirt spreads when your feet it the ground. It isn't extremely dusty, so it may have been used within the last few months.
It's rather dark, but the some of the sunlight streams through the hatch opening. You squint your eyes to see your surrounds. You remember there is one more match left.
The match illuminates and you slowly look around you. On the closest wall you see what looks like an oil lantern.
You see there is still some oil left in the lantern and it seems to be functioning properly. You can tell it's also been used before.
You move slowly around the room with the lantern. You see some old wooden tables, stacks of old shackles, and a random assortment of clothes for all genders and ages.

action_results.action: look in the back of the room
action_results.result: You head back towards where a draft comes from. There seems to a be a tunnel that you can't see the end of. It is dark and damp.
You walk down the tunnel. It's a little damp and you can hear a water drip coming from somewhere. That might be a good sign, as you are quite thirsty.
You walk a good fifthteen more minutes down the tunnel till you reach a fork in the passage. It splits into three ways. Right, middle, and left.
You head down the right passage and don't have to walk too long before coming into a room with a pile of bones in it. There seems to be both human and animal bones here, this frightens you.

action_results.action: head back and go down the middle
action_results.result: You run back and head down the middle passage. Your lantern is starting to go flicker in and out. You reach a huge room that has a heavy air to it. You are filled with dread. As you walk further into the room a deep voice bellows, "We've been waiting for you"
